channel.title: Green Day on djvelimir.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Green Day on djvelimir.github.io

item.title: I Walk alone
item.description: I walk a lonely road The only one that I have ever known Don’t know where it goes But it’s home to me and I walk alone I walk this empty street On the Boulevard of broken dreams Where the city sleeps And I’m the only one and I walk alone I walk alone I walk alone I walk alone I walk a- My shadow’s the only one that walks beside me
